question: Which badminton player won the BWF World Championships most number of times in the men's singles category?
explanation: Lin Dan won the BWF World Championships most number of times in the men's singles category. The BWF World Championships is a badminton tournament sanctioned by Badminton World Federation (BWF). The tournament offers the most ranking points, together with Summer Olympics badminton tournaments. The winners will be crowned as the "World Champions" and awarded gold medals. However, it does not offer any prize money.
